target.name: help
target.echo: Usage of this Phing:
phing help - display this help message
Compile StyleSheets / JavaScript
phing css - Compile Sass stylesheets to CSS
phing watch - Compile Sass stylesheets to CSS when they change. Recommended to use command "compass watch" instead of this phing
phing update - Update all Web Components and re-compile CSS
phing check - Check all dependencies are met and the phing tasks will work.
Handle cache
phing clear_cache - Flush cached files along with database cache (depth 3)
phing warmup - Call Frontend to generate necessary files
phing c - Clear cache, depth 1: typo3temp/Cache files
phing cc - Clear cache, depth 2: all typo3temp files
phing ccc - Clear cache, depth 3: all typo3temp files + database
Import website locally
phing dump6 - Fetch the database and build it again locally for TYPO3 6.0
phing dump - Fetch the database and build it again locally
phing localconf - Fetch localconf.php and add custom values - OBSOLETE WITH TYPO3 6.0
phing htaccess - Fetch the htaccess from the remote server
phing symlink - Create symlinks to the core - ${path.core}
phing typo3temp - Create typo3temp directory
phing uploads - Fetch uploads folder
phing fileadmin - Fetch fileadmin
phing user_upload - Fetch user_upload folder
phing d - phing dump6
phing initialize - dump, localconf, htaccess, symlink, typo3temp, uploads, user_upload
phing initialize6 - dump6, htaccess, symlink, uploads, fileadmin
phing reset - dump6, clear_cache, warmup
Commands on remote
phing status - git remote status
phing diff - git remote diff
phing st - Shortcut of "phing status"
phing df - Shortcut of "phing diff"
Possible option
-DdryRun=true - will display the command to be executed
